.. code:: python

    ...     def load(self, *args, **kwargs):
    ...         for store_attr in self.__store_attrs__:
    ...             setattr(self, store_attr, {})

Then Bonfig 'initialises' our fields, which basically means insert any values into our stores.:

.. code:: python

    ...             for field in self.__fields__:
    ...                 field.initialise(self)

And if you've defined one that does something it'll:

.. code:: python

    ...         self.finalise()
